text: @CNN We have to ask why he is obsessed w/this drug ? He doesn’t tout Adderall and we know he takes that! So what is it about hydroxychloroquine? He either has stock in the manufacture or he thinks this is really going to be his magic pill to cure covid19 and he will be a hero!!!!!
